execution_plan.description: Find all receipt numbers for customer 15 from receipts_db.receipts.
execution_plan.query: SELECT receipts.ReceiptNumber AS s1__ReceiptNumber FROM receipts WHERE receipts.CustomerId = 15;

execution_plan.description: Select distinct items from items_db.items for receipts returned by step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT items.Item AS s2__Item, items.Receipt AS s2__Receipt FROM items WHERE items.Receipt IN ($step1.s1__ReceiptNumber);
